participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, enjoys exploring new ideas and cultures.
participant_1.background: I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn more about animals and the environment. I am in the military. I'm from Seattle. I enjoy learning about other cultures.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Practical and focused, values career goals and personal growth over social distractions.
participant_2.background: I focus on my career and hobbies, so social media isn't a priority for me. I still have a photo from my senior prom in my wallet. I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics. My favorite food is Italian. My mother has 500 pairs of shoes.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going well, thanks! Just got back from a long walk with my dog.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's a big ol' goofball.
Nice! I have a cat. She's a little bit of a diva, but I love her.
She's about 10 years old. She's a rescue, so I'm not sure exactly how old she is.
Aw, that's sweet. I love cats. I've always wanted one, but I'm not sure if I have the time for one right now.
They can be a lot of work, but they're also really rewarding.
Yeah, I've heard that. I'll have to keep that in mind for the future.
Have you been doing anything fun lately?
Not really, just work and school. I'm trying to save up for a trip to Italy next year.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Italy.
It's my dream vacation. I love Italian food and culture.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
